alert.note: Alert for Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 26 at 8:22PM CST until February 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations up to three tenths of an inch, and snow and sleet accumulations up to 1 inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Waushara County. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions due to ice covered roads. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute. The worst overall conditions will occur in the morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
